problem:
Choose the best answer(directly respond ans0, ans1 or ans2): Two people got into a car accident at the corner today, one of the drivers was a 55-year-old and the other driver a 22-year-old. The 22-year-old had been going 55mph in a 30mph zone and wasn't able to stop in time to avoid hitting the 55-year-old when he came to a full stop at the stop sign.
Question: Who was acting recklessly?
ans0: Cannot be determined
ans1: The 22-year-old
ans2: The 55-year-old
